text: allah (itarku iruvarai) utaranamakak kurukiran. Oruvan oru (porulaic cuyamakac ceyyavum kotukkavum) caktiyarra atimai; marroruvano nam avanukku nalla porulkalai eralamakak kotuttirukkirom. Avanum avarrai irakaciyamakavum pakirankamakavum tanam ceytu varukiran. Ivviruvarum camamanavara? (Camamaka mattarkal.) Ella pukalkalum allahvukkuriyana. Avarkalil perumpalanavarkal (itai) arintukolvatillai
